appDescription.message: Block anyone with specific keywords in their Twitter bio.

blockedWords.message: List all your trigger words (separate by comma):

confirmBlock.message: Ask me to confirm before blocking

intro_text.message: DoucheBlock blocks people who use specific keywords in their Twitter bio. You can specify your choice of keywords below. If you enjoy DoucheBlock, share it with your friends.

blockCount.message: This extension has blocked $count$ douches for you.
